title: Don’t Build a PC Right Now. Just Don’t
description: PC component prices are really out of control right now.
content: There is little hope for PC builders in the coming months. In the span of a few weeks, RAM prices have tripled, quadrupled, quintupled, and shot so high theyve become a meme. SSD storage is likely ne… [+5622 chars]
